title: The difference between GPay and Google Pay – Which one should you use?
content:
Google’s product naming and marketing have sometimes lacked efficiency, leaving customers confused as to what product or app they’re actually using. One prime example is Google Pay – er – GPay. This guide will explain the difference between the two and which one you should start using.

more…

The post The difference between GPay and Google Pay – Which one should you use? appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Pay and GPay are the same thing, right? Nope! This guide will explain the differences between the two apps.
